WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I have developed a plugin for the WIndows Media Server (usingh C++, ATL), this plugin has a dialog for taking some user input. I want to open this dialog somewhere from the server UI, but unable to figure out how to add an item (like menu option etc.) in the server UI from my plugin.
 
Please help out with some sample, that will guide to customize the server UI by using custom plugins.
WorkItem.Summary: Customization of Windows Media Server UI
